text: @realDonaldTrump @robertjeffress @VP If that's true,use that time and ask God for forgiveness,which I doubt,for more than 128,000 you have allowed COVID-19 to kill so far,and the American troops you have allowed Russia to kill. They paid Taliban to kill American troops,the same Taliban you invited to the White House
